DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study to assess the effects of chronic administration of Vyvanse (lis-dexamphetamine) on glucose metabolism in a sample of children and adolescents with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) who also have glucose intolerance and are obese.
DOC.brief_title: Vyvanse and Glucose Intolerance in Children With Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) and Obesity
DOC.criteria: male or female, ages between 8 and 17 Body Mass Index > 30 fasting blood sugar between 90100 mg/dl 2 hour post prandial >140 <180 mg/dl meets criteria for a diagnosis of ADHD, any subtype known cardiovascular disease or diabetes structural cardiac abnormalities, abnormal ECGs, family history of sudden death positive urine drug screen fasting blood sugar level > 126 mg/dl HbA1c > 6.5 % Weight > 300 lbs
